definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: shave, shave off (so NH, Aram.)—Pf. [[וְגִלַּח]] consec. Le 14:8 + 2 t.; sf. [[וְגִלְּחוֹ]] consec. 2Sa 14:26; 3 fs. [[וְגִלְּחָה]] consec. De 21:12; Impf. [[יְגַלַּח]] Le 14:9, Is 7:20, [[יְגַָלֵּחַ]] Le 13:33 + 2 t., [[וַיְגַלַּח]] Ge 41:14, 2Sa 10:4; sf. (3 ms.) [[יְגַלְּחֶגּוּ]], [[וַיְגַלְּחֵם]]1Ch 19:4; 3 fs. [[וַתְּנַלַּךְ]] Ju Jdg 16:19; 3 mpl. [[יְגַלֵָּחוּ]] Le 21:5, Ez Eze 44:20; Inf. sf. of subj. [[גַּלְּחוֹ]] 2Sa 14:26; —

shave, obj. the head, [[ראׁשׁ]] Nu 6:9, Nu 6:9, Nu 6:18 (P) De 21:12 (hair as containing impurity, cf. RS:Sem i. 407), 2Sa 14:26, 2Sa 14:26 cf.; 2Sa 14:26, Ez Eze 44:20; Le 13:33 (P), obj. [[הַנֶתֶק]]; obj. persons 1Ch 19:4.
shave off, the hair [[שֵׂעָר]] Le 14:8, Le 14:9, Le 14:9 (P) cf. Ju Jdg 16:19; the beard [[זׇקָן]] Le 21:5 (H) 2Sa 10:4.
fig. of devastation by Assyrians Is 7:20 (obj. [[הָראׁשׁ]], [[שַׂעַר הָרַגְלָָיִם]] and [[הַזׇּקָן]]).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[גֻּלָָּח]] Ju Jdg 16:22, [[גֻּלַּחְתִּי]] Ju Jdg 16:17; Pt. cstr. [[מְגֻלְּחֵי]] Je 41:5 ;—be shaven, subj. pers. (of Samson) Ju Jdg 16:17, Jdg 16:22; [[מְגֻלְּחֵי זׇקָן]] Je 41:5.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהִתְגַּלָָּח]] consec. Le 13:33; Inf. sf. [[הִתְגַּלְּחוֹ]] Nu 6:19; —shave oneself Le 13:33; c. acc. [[אֶת־נִזְרוֹ]] Nu 6:19 (both P).
